hòu

item.A:
chú

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: difference; discrepancy; to differ; error; to err; to make a mistake
2: differ from; short of; to lack; poor
3: send; a messenger; a mission; to commission
item.A:
1: chā 2: chà 3: chāi
差别 (差別) chābié difference; disparity 差不多 chàbuduō almost, nearly 开小差 (開小差) kāixiǎochāi AWOL, Absent With Out Leave; desert the military

item.Q:
Write the character:
(final particle in classical Chinese, expressing question or doubt, similar to 嗎|吗)
item.A:
乎 (strokes unavailable)
hū
几乎 (幾乎) jīhū almost; nearly; practically

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: capacity; quantity; amount; to estimate
2: to measure
item.A:
1: liàng 2: liáng
质量 (質量) zhìliàng quality; mass (in physics) 原子量 yuánzǐliáng atomic weight

item.A:
jiǔ

to drop; to fall
item.A:
diào

item.Q:
Write the character: què
(zhèngquè de què)
item.A:
确 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 確
authenticated; solid; firm; real; true
正确 (正確) zhèngquè correct; proper

traditional: 時候
shíhou time; length of time; moment; period
shíhòu time
shìjiè world

traditional: 正確
zhèngquè correct; proper
lìliang power; force; strength
dàliàng great amount; large quantity; numerous

traditional: 確定
quèdìng definite; certain; fixed; to fix; to determine; be sure; OK (Windows UI)

traditional: 英國
Yīngguó England; Britain; English
zhòngliàng weight
chúle besides; apart from (... also...); in addition to; except (for)

traditional: 四人幫
sìrénbāng Gang of Four: Jiang Qing 江青, Zhang Chunqiao 張春橋, Yao Wenyuan 姚文元, Wang Hongwen 王洪文, who served as scapegoats for the excesses of the cultural revolution

traditional: 人類
rénlèi humanity; human race; mankind

traditional: 數量
shùliàng amount; quantity

traditional: 機器
jīqì machine

traditional: 種類
zhǒnglèi kind; genus; type; category; variety; species; sort; class

traditional: 明確
míngquè clear-cut; definite; make clear; clear

traditional: 告訴
gàosu to tell; to inform; to let know
gàosù to tell
ànjiàn law case; legal case; judicial case

traditional: 幾乎
jīhū almost; nearly; practically
néngliàng energy; capabilities

traditional: 專門
zhuānmén specialist; specialized; customized
